article_title: UN says no let-up in Israeli air strikes in Gaza
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  at  least  70  people  were  killed  in  the  Israeli  strike.

article_title: UN says no let-up in Israeli air strikes in Gaza
sentence: The  war  began  on  7  October  after  Hamas  led  a  deadly  attack  on  communities  inside  Israel,  killing  1,200  people,  mainly  civilians,  and  seizing  about  240  hostages.

article_title: UN says no let-up in Israeli air strikes in Gaza
sentence: Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry  said  on  Monday  that  some  20,674  Palestinians  had  been  killed  in  Israeli  bombardments  since  then.
